html:
Tabs always said that in kitty modeling, the best defense is a good offense. If you just rest on your laurels, sooner or later a hungrier up-and-coming cat (or Australian Shepherd) will take whatâ€™s yours, and you wonâ€™t be walking the catwalk at feline fashion week anymore. Nope, if youâ€™re lucky, youâ€™ll get a page in the Petco catalog.

Every once in a while Tabs went into kitty ninja mode, and instead of just patrolling the neighborhood, he conducted more advanced cat reconâ€¦

Heâ€™d inspect the houses on the circle more closely to look for signs of canine or feline incursion.

One day, he picked up a new catâ€™s scent around an air conditioning filter a couple houses down. He sniffed the area for a long time, gathering intelligence, and then used the data to compile a cat profile.

According to Tabs, the new cat was a three-year-old male tabby with green eyes and a crooked tailâ€¦ Moderate kitty modeling potential. Of course, he was added to the database. ðŸ™‚

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,
